snippet: A stock market at a lofty peak can be high-risk for new investors. But if you still want to jump in, strategists advise keeping a diverse portfolio.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column contends with the stock market at a lofty peak, it can be high-risk for new investors; says if they still want to jump in, strategists advise keeping a diverse and balanced portfolio containing many different stocks and bonds.
lead_paragraph: A stock market at a lofty peak can be high-risk for new investors. But if you still want to jump in, strategists advise keeping a diverse portfolio.

headline.print_headline: Joining the Bandwagon? Don’t Lose Your Balance
headline.seo: If Stocks Look Irresistible, Don’t Forget to Diversify
headline.main: Joining the Bandwagon? Don’t Lose Your Balance
